doc:
Julia Sawalha https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Julia_Sawalha 0 Julia Sawalha (born 9 September 1968) is an English actress known mainly for her role as Saffron Monsoon in the BBC sitcom Absolutely Fabulous. She is also known for portraying Lynda Day, editor of the Junior Gazette, in Press Gang and Lydia Bennet in the 1995 television miniseries of Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice. Additionally, she played Dorcas Lane in the BBC's costume drama Lark Rise to Candleford, Carla Borrego in Jonathan Creek, and Jan Ward in the 2014 BBC One mystery Remember Me. Julia_Sawalha ( born_9_September_1968 ) is an_English_actress known mainly for her_role as Saffron_Monsoon in the_BBC_sitcom Absolutely Fabulous . She is_also_known for portraying Lynda_Day , editor of the_Junior_Gazette , in Press_Gang and Lydia_Bennet in the_1995_television_miniseries of Jane_Austen 's_Pride_and_Prejudice . Additionally , she played Dorcas_Lane in the_BBC 's_costume_drama_Lark_Rise to Candleford , Carla_Borrego in Jonathan_Creek , and Jan_Ward in the_2014_BBC_One_mystery Remember Me .
